lines: Welcome!  Press any key to continue
Use [W] [A] [S] [D] to move around.
Something is wrong here, the forest is angry!
I need to stop the corrupted plants before they destroy everything!
Press [Left Mouse Button] to attack in that direction.
These are your plots!
You can plant a seed here to grow more of them!
Use [Right Mouse Button] to plant a seed in your inventory to a plot.
Use [Left Mouse Button] to harvest a grown plant.
I think it's planted, I wonder how it will turn out?
A seed? Maybe I could replant this back at the farm? [Right Mouse Button]
Press [Right Mouse Button] to use an item in your inventory.
Press [Q] or [E] to cycle through your selected items
This kind of looks like a heart...
Maybe I can use this [Right Mouse Button] to patch myself up when I'm hurt.
I will have to be holding this to use it though...
I don't need to use this right now, I'm not hurt at the moment
This looks like the thorns those plants spit at me!
I can throw this back at them!
(Select the thorn item and throw with [Right Mouse Button])
This looks like it would shatter into pieces after a decent impact!
I can throw this at an area and hit a group of them!
(Select the pinecone grenade item and throw with [Right Mouse Button])
This looks like it could be used to further protect myself!
It might improve how much of the plants' attacks are blocked!
(Select the flammenbaum barrier item and use with [Right Mouse Button])
Errgggghh! This causes a terrible feeling  that makes me want to destroy it!
It would probably focus the attention of some of those plants to it and leave me to be for a bit!
(Select the attention clasp and place with [Right Mouse Button])
This seems to have the same roots as the corpse flower, meaning this may contain a poisonous gas inside it.
If I throw it hard it should be able to break and leave a cloud behind!
(Select the clouded grenade item and place with [Right Mouse Button])
This area seems more threatening.
Should I still proceed further?
Home Sweet Home!
It's nice to be back.
What will I find in here?
Will I stay out long enough to see what has been making those noises at night?
When Gilroy was a child, he discovered a unique plant.
It was Gilroy's favorite plant and got him to be recognized in the neighborhood.
Due to that increased attention, there were a lot of peers who scorned him.
He had then lost his plant due to others either stealing or destroying it.
Despite this, Gilroy makes it all the way through college and recieves a letter.
It tells him that he will be inheriting the farm he lived in as a child.
When he returns, he sees the farm in disarray and his favorite plant missing.
He then decides "I will protect my home from this corruption."
He picks up his shovel and heads into the forest.
What is... Oh, father's almanac.
I could use this to document those plants I have seen and grown.
I can't plant this item!
I can't plant this here!
I have to be at a plot to plant seeds.
It's a better idea to wait until the plants are fully grown to harvest them.
"You can do it."
"You will grow strong, keep trying."
"I can't wait to see what you become."
What just h-...
I... Died?..
Did that just happen?
Even though I seem fine physically, that felt real.
Who was talking to me?
Why did what they say sound familiar?
Ah, I see you've made it...so far from home aren't we?
And you have brought much flesh, even that of your own
Well isn't that just delightful
No no don't be shy, I've had my fill already
Isn't this place wonderful, there's grub everywhere
Don't mind my friend, he...er...she?
It began following me some time ago
Though it doesn't bother me one bit
My stomachs as been much happier since our meeting
Perhaps when you're done with whatever it is your doing, you could come back and pay me a visit
Where?...oh yes of course
Make your trek into this wonderous feast of a forest
Do be sure to watch your step, it can be wet where it looks dry
And dry where it looks wet
Although that might have been me salivating?
You must be going now, I am certain we will meet again
We will meat again
